title: Foodie - Peer-to-peer Marketplace
description: Foodie is a peer-to-peer market place for home cooked meals. It is built out of React and uses Sharetribe's headless ecommerce Saas on the backend. I was the lead developer on this project.
deliverables: Providing technical leadership including scoping and feature development
Project management including client communications, ticket tracking, and reporting
Integration of services such as Stripe and Mapbox
Setting up CI/CD, hosting, DNS, and a scalable workflow
